content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  April 12 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has affirmed Loews Corporations' (Loews; NYSE: L) long-term Issuer Default Rating (IDR) and senior unsecured notes at 'A'. The Rating Outlook is revised to Negative from Stable. The Negative Outlook reflects Fitch's application of its 'Rating Investment Holding Companies' criteria  in particular the quality and diversification of dividend flows from investees. The Fitch-calculated blended income s
name: Loews Corporation
title: Fitch Affirms Loews Corporation's IDR at 'A'; Outlook Revised to Negative
